entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot have a property called "Model" ona class when model binding on postback #45240
  • Consider adding id property to the Blazor WASM manifest.json file #45239
  • Blazor WASM: Can't pass WebAuthn PublicKeyCredential from JS to .NET #45236
    Discussions
  • [Blazor] Add missing logging #45234
    Backlog
  • Deadlock in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing on .NET 7 #45233
  • [Feature Request] Merging splatted attributes in Blazor #45230
    Backlog
  • Explictily log working directory and let user know it will be used as content root path by default. #45229
  • DataProtectionBuilder API enhancement #45228

Closed

  • Incorrect OpenApi documentation in Minimal API when using WithOpenApi extension method #45192
    8.0-preview1
  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #43230
    8.0-preview1
  • Http1AndHttp2 should warn if Tls is disabled #43837
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Create a field for @ref like x:Name in xaml #45181
  • [OIDC] - Failed to authenticate - Regression after upgrading to .NET 7 #45187
  • Semingly random CorrelationCookieNotFound issues #45166
  • Docs - Minimal API - Document your APIs #44257
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BlazorWebAssembly.Tests crashed on Darwin CI leg #43926
    8.0-MQ

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix response code description in Minimal APIs #45244
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly to MVC Model Binding #45243
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update SauceLabs Connection version #45242
    area-signalr
  • Enable `UsePkce` by default for Google and Facebook auth #45235
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Spa proxy enhancements #45232
    area-runtime
  • Fix for W3C cookie logging #45226
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix response code description in Minimal APIs #45231
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • [feature/green-threads] Update dependencies #45241
    area-infrastructure
  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #44860
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Update @types/Webpack #45211
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution
  • Add OnPrepareResponseAsync #45062
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Api Controllers] Infer parameter source from ElementType for IEnumerable #45173
    area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2051204 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Route tooling: Support component routes #44656
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • Add support for comment syntax to route detector #45185
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
  • Support `sub` as `ExternalLoginInfo.ProviderKey` #45198
    area-identity, community-contribution
